featured.text: Researchers further point out that in most people synesthesia is active only during the first months of their infancy, while this ability remains forever in certain individuals.

definition.zh_def: 嬰兒期；幼年期，通常指從出生到一歲的時期。
definition.en_def: The period of early childhood, typically from birth to one year of age.
definition.example: During infancy, a baby develops crucial motor and sensory skills.
